Text.Text: I mean you no harm, adventurer.  I ask that you leave me be...
I do not know.  I have no name.  I have never had need of a name till now...  You may call me Zaem if you wish.
I was not born into this world as most beings are.  I was created as part of an experiment.
I do not know.  I asked my creator the reason for my being, but he would not say.  He seemed... embarrassed and asked that we not discuss the matter.

I am no monster, adventurer.  I would ask that you refrain from calling me one.  As for the reason behind my creation, I do not know.  I asked my creator the reason for my being, but he would not say.  He seemed... embarrassed and asked that we not discuss the matter.
I will not say.  I do not wish to cause him trouble.
He was ordered to destroy me, but he did not.  Instead he gave me my freedom, hid me here, and brought me food each day.  If they find that he has done this...
Dark men in red robes.  They are weavers of magic.  They would be angry if they found that I was not destroyed.  They might punish my creator...
I would not know.  I have never left this fortress and I doubt I ever will.
He stopped coming.  I have not seen him for several days.  I could not wait any longer.  It shames me, but I stole the food.
I have seen food brought to those people each day.  More food will be brought to them tomorrow.
I am no beast.  Do not treat me as such.  As for the food, I have seen food brought to those people each day.  More food will be brought to them tomorrow.
Forgive me, I did not know.  I meant no harm to anyone.  I will not steal their food again...  I do not know what to do though.  I hunger... all the time... I must have food.
I do not understand what I am about to tell you.  I am but repeating what I was told by my creator.  My body has been... accelerated to the point where I am beginning to phase out of reality.
That is all I know.  It is why I am so fast.  It is why I cannot be easily seen.  It is also why I always hunger...  I would ask that you aid me as you did the slaves.  Will you find me some food?
Ah...  This will do nicely.  I am grateful to you.
I am grateful for your aid.  I shall await your return.
I...  I do not know of what you speak.
I am not a beast, adventurer.  Do not address me as such.
It is the name of someone I respect and admire.  It is a name that I will wear with pride and honor.
I...  Why do you ask?
What?  No...  How did he die?
I do not understand.  What do you mean?

No, I will not accept that.  It is true that at one time Zaem was a brooding and driven man.  However, something changed him.  He was happy.  He began to look at life through new eyes.  He would not take his own life.
Never!  I would not do such a thing.  He was my creator, my tutor, and... my friend.  He was ordered to slay me, but he did not.  He gave me my freedom, hid me here, and brought me food each day...
Yes.  He came to me each day.
Yes.  It shames me to admit it, but I did.
May I ask why?
What do you mean?
I see your point.
I meant no offense to you.
It shames me to admit it, but I did steal the food.
I hunger...  I have no food...  I did not know what else to do...
I...  No.  I am in hiding here.
You have returned.  How may I aid you?
I do not understand what I am about to tell you.  I am but repeating what I was told by my creator.  My body has been... accelerated to the point where I am beginning to phase out of reality.
Zaem Astyr...  I should not have revealed his name, but you appear trustworthy.
Yes...  I hunger... all the time... I must have food.  Will you help me?
I am grateful for you coming to me with this news.  I will rest easy now.
Why?  Why did he do it?
I understand now...  He stopped coming to feed me because he was slain...
Who are you?
I cannot leave just yet.  I must speak with you about the food you are stealing.
I witnessed you stealing food.  I am here to put an end to your thieving ways.  Prepare to die!
I must take my leave of you.  Farewell.
You have no name?  Why?
Zaem...  As in Zaem Astyr?  You must be his creation.
Zaem...  That is an unusual name.  What made you choose it?
With what purpose in mind?
What possible purpose could a monstrosity like you serve?
Experiment?  What kind of experiment?
Who is your creator?
Who is your creator?
Who is your creator?
Who is your creator?
What is the harm in naming him?
Enough of this pointless talk.  You are a beast and a thief as well.  Prepare to die!
Who are these people that you fear, Zaem?
If your creator brings you food, then why must you steal it?
So tell me, Zaem.  If your creator brings you food, then why must you steal it?
In my training as a mage, I have heard of such wizards.  They hail from the country of Thay.
So tell me, Zaem.  If your creator brings you food, then why must you steal it?
I must ask you to stop stealing the food, Zaem.  People are going hungry.
So, you admit your guilt.  You will stop stealing the food, beast, or I will be forced to slay you.
Yes, but they are slaves.  They are only allowed so much food.  They are going hungry because of the thefts.
Those people are slaves.  They are only allowed a certain amount of food.  They are going hungry because of the thefts.
Enough of this pointless talk.  You are a beast and a thief as well.  Prepare to die!
Why is it that you are hungry all the time?
I know I am going to regret asking this, but just why are you so damn hungry all the time?
Go on.
Very well, I shall do so.
I will do what I can, but I cannot make any promises.
No, I will not help you.  Farewell.
I found this ring of nourishment.  So long as you wear it, you will not hunger.
I am glad to have been of aid.  Farewell.
Farewell.
I think you do.  Zaem is an unusual name.  Why would you choose it unless you know him?
Do not lie to me, beast.  Zaem is an unusual name.  Why would you choose it unless you know him?
You have not answered me.  Are you his creation?
Then you must be the creation of Zaem Astyr.  Is that correct?
If you are Zaem's creation, then you should know that he is dead.
Actually, that is what I am trying to discover.
I believe that he was murdered by a man named Cedrin Zil.
He was murdered by a man named Cedrin Zil.  However, justice has prevailed and he has paid for his crime with his life.
On the one hand, he appears to have taken his own life.
Well, on the other hand, I found a diary that implicates a creature of Zaem's may have turned on him...
You say that Zaem was feeding you?
Yes...  I remember you saying that he came to you each day and fed you.
And you began to steal food because he stopped coming.
I see...  Then I believe you to be innocent of his death.
Speaking of the food thefts, you must stop now.
I must take my leave of you.  Farewell.
By my reckoning, the timing of the food thefts is wrong.
Be glad that I have found you innocent.  Do not try my patience with your questions.
Had you slain Zaem, you would have begun the thefts at once.  You did not.  You believed he would come to you as he always had.
Speaking of the food thefts, you must stop now.
Farewell for now.
Whatever.  Now, in regard to these food thefts.  You will stop, or I will be forced to stop you.
Farewell for now.
Why?
That is what I wanted to hear.  I am here to put an end to your thieving ways.  Prepare to die!
You do not have access to the kitchens, do you?  You do not belong here.
I see.  Just who are you then?
Who are you?
I would speak with you about the food you are stealing.
I think I know who you are.  You are the creation of Zaem Astyr, are you not?
I wanted to let you know that I am still searching for a way to feed you.
I found this ring of nourishment.  So long as you wear it, you will not hunger.
I wanted to know if you are still having trouble finding food.
I have come to tell you that the man responsible for Zaem's death has been found and dealt with.
You cannot.  Farewell for now.
I see.  Why was this done to you?
What is the harm in naming him?
Very well, I shall do so.
I will do what I can, but I cannot make any promises.
No, I will not help you.  Farewell.
Farewell, Zaem.
It was a matter of simple jealousy.
You say that Zaem was feeding you?
